channel.title: CVE Feed for POWR.io -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for POWR.io -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-45609|2024-08-02T20:21:16.684Z -- powr.io -- contact%20form%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20builder%2C%20payment%20form%2C%20and%20more
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in POWR.Io Contact Form – Custom Builder, Payment Form, and More allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Contact Form – Custom Builder, Payment Form, and More: from n/a through 2.1.0.
